questions.question: High frequency on aircraft alternators is selected in order to

answers.a: free the systems from external disturbance

questions.question: If the input to the prime mover of an alternator is kept constant but the excitation is changed then the

answers.a: power factor of load remains constant
answers.b: reactive component of the output is changed
answers.c: power factor of load remains constant
answers.d: active component of the output is changed

questions.question: The advantage of salient poles in an alternator is

answers.c: adoptability to low and medium speed operation

questions.question: A three phase alternator has a phase sequence of RYB for its three output voltages, for clockwise rotation. Now if the alternator is rotated anticlockwise, the phase sequence will be
In order to reduce the harmonics in the emf generated in an alternator
